microagent.simulation

Class Plan

  • java.lang.Object
    • microagent.simulation.Plan

  • public class Plan
extends java.lang.Object
    A plan provides the MicroAgent a list of nodes to travel through during the simulation. The plan is created using the current road network with origin and destination of a MicroAgent.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
